refnamediv.refpurpose: Finds median values in an input

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: val = cvMedian(image) val = cvMedian(image, name, value, .....)

listitem.para: The sort method to calculate the median - Quick sort or Insertion Sort. Default : Quick sort
Dimension along which the function operates - Row, Column, All or Custom. Default : All

The integer dimension over which the function calculates the median. This value cannot exceed the number of dimensions in input. It applies only when 'Dimension' property is set to 'Custom'. Default : 1

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calculates the median values in a given input image matrix.
